subject: Basketball
Firearms
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards could cite a leaguewide morals clause in attempting to escape paying Gilbert Arenas for the next four seasons, but his league suspension poses a hurdle.
snippet: The Washington Wizards could cite a leaguewide morals clause in attempting to escape paying Gilbert Arenas for the next four seasons, but his league suspension poses a hurdle.
